Heavily math inspired art

Here, we document overwhelmingly math-inspired art.

Sketches

  • In this first sketch, we draw the zeta function. It's interactive. The mouse gives a point (x, y), and the first 100 terms of the zeta function at $x + iy$ are plotted, each getting their own color. Note that this is a description of the actual sum, not the analytic continuation.

In the future, this wants to be given a color scheme like in 3b1b's video and sent to him (after various improvements).
